message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"exactly; right on time","sentence":"现在正下雨。","image_prompt":"A digital illustration in a soft apocalypse animation style, showing a large clock striking the exact hour under a dark and moody sky. Outside, rain pours steadily. The mood is somber, with muted and soft colors. The focus is on the moment the rain starts exactly as the hour changes on the clock.","sentence_translation":"It is raining right now."}
